articles.description: Baldur’s Gate 3 is looking to be one of the best games of 2023 in a year already full of some of the best games of the generation. And their stance on microtransactions is great.

Call of Duty will now alert players in real time if a cheater is removed from the game.
The addition to the game's Ricochet cheating system comes as part of the newly released Warzone season five.
